title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti al dente
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta until crispy
Whisk eggs and grated cheeses together
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water
Quickly mix hot pasta with egg mixture, adding pancetta and pepper
Add pasta water as needed to create creamy sauce
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper
